name: CardZ.com
tag_list: credit-cards, best-credit-card-offers, best-credit-cards, apply-credit-cards, compare-credit-card-offers, credit-card-application, get-a-credit-card, interest-free-credit-card, cash-back-rewards, cash-back-cards, balance-transfer-cards, credit-cards-balan
overview: CardZ.com provides an easy way to compare and evaluate credit card offers. Users can compare interest rates, rewards, credit limits and other credit card features and pick the best credit card offer for individual needs. Credit Cards are organized by popularity to simplify searching. CardZ.com is a free service for end users.
